vlive.korean: [나코 야자타임 적응력 무엇] [꾸벅] - 예나 동생~ - 아 네. Ye Na "dongseng" (younger sister). - Oh, yes. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [IZ*ONE] 야자타임을 지배한 하카타꿀주먹👊🏻💕 (IZ*ONE's yajatime!)
너 진짜 적응력 대박인듯. You are so good at adapting yourself to things. 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : [MMMTV4] EP5 별이 빛났던 밤들 PART 1
vlive.english: You are so good at adapting yourself to things.

vlive.korean: 그래서 어디에서나 적응력이 뛰어나다. I'm able to adjust to any kind of situation. 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 연휴. 심심한분?:-)
vlive.english: I'm able to adjust to any kind of situation.

vlive.korean: 그나마 제업이가 적응력이 빠르니까... Je Up is the best at adapting to new places... 듣기 View video IMFACT : [IMFACT] 컴백 카운트다운, D-6!!!
vlive.english: Je Up is the best at adapting to new places...

vlive.korean: [상황 적응력 갑...] 보고 싶었다. [Queen of adjusting to the situation] I really missed you guys! 듣기 View video LOVELYZ : '러블리즈 다이어리 시즌5' 6화 ('Lovelyz Diary Season 5' EP.6)
vlive.english: [Queen of adjusting to the situation] I really missed you guys!

examples.korean: Children are highly adaptable—they just need time to readjust. 발음듣기 아이들은 적응력이 아주 높다. 그들은 그저 시간만 지나면 다시 적응한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Children are highly adaptable—they just need time to readjust. 발음

examples.korean: Successful businesses are highly adaptable to economic change. 발음듣기 성공한 기업들은 경제 변화에 대한 적응력이 아주 높다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Successful businesses are highly adaptable to economic change. 발음

examples.korean: Human beings are infinitely adaptable. 발음듣기 인간은 적응력이 한이 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Human beings are infinitely adaptable. 발음

examples.korean: The child is very adaptable. 발음듣기 그 어린이는 매우 적응력이 뛰어나다. Neungyule
examples.english: The child is very adaptable. 발음

examples.korean: But it is also a world in which innovative and flexible companies can outshine the field for years. 발음듣기 그러나 지금은 혁신적이고 적응력 있는 기업들이라면 업계에서 오래 우위를 유지할 수 있는 세계이기도 하다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: But it is also a world in which innovative and flexible companies can outshine the field for years. 발음
